meanings.definition: A tropical plant with starchy roots.
meanings.sent1: The yuca grew tall in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: I cooked yuca for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The yuca plant danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas took root like a yuca plant.
meanings.sent5: The yuca's roots reached deep into the soil.

meanings.definition: The edible root of the yuca plant.
meanings.sent1: I peeled the yuca before cooking it.
meanings.sent2: Yuca is a staple food in many countries.
meanings.sent3: The yuca root smiled up at me from the plate.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a yuca root.
meanings.sent5: The yuca root was as white as snow.
